name: Javier Quilez Cabello
bio: As a specialist in automation for non-profits, Iâ€™m dedicated to driving efficiency through open source solutions that empower NGOs. Leveraging tools like Mautic, RocketChat, Cal.com, KoBoToolbox, Nextcloud, Taiga, WordPress, WooCommerce, and Baserow, I integrate these platforms with the third-sector CRM, SinergiaCRM. Passionate about #tech4good, I develop workflows that enhance collaboration and amplify social impact. My mission is to harness automation for meaningful change. #n8n4good
